"Checking in on your pet

"
"To see how your pet is doing, you can pet them by tapping on them in the home screen. " "Your pet will then display a happy, average, or sad emote, depending on how it's feeling. " "If your pet is feeling sad, you can feed them to make them happier, and if you leave them. " "alone for awhile, they will get sadder. You can buy cheap food for your pet which they wont " "like all that much, or you can buy expensive food which will make them much happier.

"
"Using the inventory

"
"You can tap the inventory drop down in the top left of the home screen to open the inventory. " "From there, each item will display an action beside the item name. If the item says Feed before " "it's name, tapping it will cause the pet to eat that item. If the item says Outfit, then tapping " "that changes the pet's outfit. Lastly, Background changes the home background.

"
"Using the shop.

"
"If you tap on the shop tab at the bottom of the screen, you'll bring up the shop where you can " "buy several items. The cost of each item will be displayed besides the item's name, and the total " "number of tokens you have will be listed near the top of the screen. Once you tap an item, it will " "be added to your inventory.

"
"Playing Fetch.

"
"You can play fetch with your pet by going to the games tab at the bottom of the screen and " "tapping the play fetch button. From there, tap your pet to throw the ball to them as they " "move around the screen. Each time you throw the ball to your pet, your score will increase " "a bit, and you will earn tokens to spend in the shop. Use the back arrow on your android device " "to return to the previous screen.

"
